name: scratchpad
@comment scripts: Fusebox produces bundles that can be x10-20 smaller than NCC due to tree-shaking.
You can use either, or use the other if the bundle one produces has errors
NCC does not permit passing an output file name, so it will output to 'index.js' in ./dist
You may want to rename this or rewrite config.yaml to point to index.js if using NCC
